name: docker-node
description: The official Node.js docker image, made with love by the node community.

scripts.lint-doctoc: cp README.md README.md.tmp && doctoc --title='## Table of Contents' --github README.md && diff -q README.md README.md.tmp
scripts.test: npm run updateDockerfiles && npm run lint-eclint && npm run lint-doctoc && npm run lint-markdown-link-check
